content: fly eagles fly hat pattern © corina cook 2018 yarns used kraemer perfection worsted weight 30% domestic merino 70% acrylic gentle wash tumble dry colors used a white fluff 1504 b green alligator 1506 tools used size 7 16 circular needle size 8 16 circular needle size 8 double pointed needles yarn needle for finishing gauge 18 stitches and 23 row = 4 one size - 23 for adult male or female emblazon your team spirit on your hat with the rousing eagles fight song words fly eagles fly using white and midnight green and simple-to-follow stranded colorwork create a hat that is a surefire hit for any philly football fan this is the year baby we re going to the super bowl
